Articles.Content:
Hi,

I was wondering if it was possible to alter the interior view of a cockpit? I downloaded the C9 mod, and although the upgraded mk 2 stuff looks great from the outside, the interior is utterly unuseable. Is it possible to change the interior view of this piece to that of the mk1 cockpit?

Also, is it possible to change the view point within the cockpit itself? I'd like to be sitting a little higher up.

Thanks!
